outline:
1. apartness, holiness, sacredness, separateness
    1. apartness, sacredness, holiness
      1. of God
      2. of places
      3. of things
    2. set-apartness, separateness
kjv_def: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.
strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
